text: Uye batisisai mese pamwechete, patambo yaAllah (Qurâ€™aan), uye musava munoparadzana pakati penyu, uye rangarirai makomborero aAllah kwamuri, apo pamakange makavengana asi vakakubatanidzai (Allah) moyo yenyu pamwechete, mukava madzikoma nemakomborero avo (muchitendero); uye maive pamusuwo pegomba remoto, vakave vanokununurai kubva kwauri. Ndiwo maratidziro anoita Allah zviratidzo zvavo kwamuri, kuti mungave mugwara
